name: Diamonds (itch)
description:
Nothing to do? Bored? Wanna clear your head?

Then waste your Time with Diamonds!

Just sit down and click through the game.

Combine three Gems in the same Color for Points and 4 Gems in the same Color for Remove all Other Gems of this Color from the Gameboard.

Nothing more, nothing less.

No Quests, no Micro-Transactions, no Advertising,  just click and play.

I will update the game on a regulary distance, so follow the game if you are interessed.

Sincerly

DG

P.s: Critics, Bug-Listings and so on are appreciate and welcome!
